name: The Good Samaritan Hospital of Cincinnati, Ohio

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: The Good Samaritan Hospital of Cincinnati, Ohio is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Cincinnati, OH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $85.6M in Medicaid payments across 2.0M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $85.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
